label: religious_theism
description: A worldview centered on the existence of a personal God (or gods) who created and sustains the universe, and whose will provides a moral framework. Encompasses major theistic traditions including Christianity, Islam, and Judaism.
core_assumptions: A personal God exists and is the ultimate source of reality.
Sacred texts or divine revelation are authoritative sources of truth.
Moral truths are grounded in divine command or divine nature.
Human beings have a spiritual dimension beyond the physical.
example_claims: The universe was created with purpose and design.
Prayer can influence outcomes in the physical world.
Human life has inherent sacred value from conception.
